title: Rivington Street #305 - Lewis Street looking southwest

text:
(1)
Rivington Street, north side, east from Columbia, across Cannon to Lewis Street. The DeWitt Memorial Church is at No. 280 Rivington Street and is between Columbia and Cannon Streets. Between the latter point and Lewis Street appears an empty space where former P.S. No. 88 stood and which is used for recreational purposes. The 6 story tenement just beyond is on the opposite side of Lewis Street and occupies the N.E. corner.

June 29, 1938.

P.L. Sperr

(2)
Rivington Street, east from Columbia, showing the De Witt
Memorial Church.

P. L. Sperr

(1) Rivington Street, North Side looking from North East corner of Cannon Street, looking Eastwards from Rivington.

(2) Rivington Street, North Side corner of crossing with Leins Street at North East corner looking Eastwards on Rivington.

May 12, 1939.

(1) Rivington Street, North Side looking from North East corner of Cannon Street, looking Eastwards from Rivington.

(2) Rivington Street, North Side corner of crossing with Leins Street at North East corner looking Eastwards on Rivington.

May 12, 1939.
